chunks.zh: [送码] SlideBrowser - 一个轻量的滑动浏览器，给你不一样的交互体验
chunks.en: [Giving away codes] SlideBrowser - a lightweight sliding browser that gives you a different interactive experience

chunks.zh: [SlideBrowser]( https://deepthinkapps.com/zh/apps/slide-browser/) 是一个滑动浏览器，当你鼠标移动到屏幕边缘，自动出现，当失焦时自动隐藏。
chunks.en: [SlideBrowser]( https://deepthinkapps.com/zh/apps/slide-browser/) is a sliding browser that automatically appears when you move your mouse to the edge of the screen and automatically hides when it loses focus.

chunks.zh: 总体来说这算是一个小众产品，主要是用场景有：
chunks.en: Overall, this is a niche product, mainly used in the following scenarios:

chunks.zh: - 在应用全屏模式下查询资料、问 GPT 等
chunks.en: - Query information and ask GPT in application full-screen mode, etc.

chunks.zh: - 记录一些待办事项或者笔记
chunks.en: - Record some to-do items or notes
- View stock market and cryptocurrency market information

chunks.zh: 以下是一些场景的 GIF 图：
chunks.en: Below are some GIFs of the scenarios:

chunks.zh: ![SlideBrowser 应用场景 - 全屏模式搜索信息]( https://i.miji.bid/2025/02/21/873e3d7a823e46a0683ba55c48f03016.gif)
chunks.en: ![SlideBrowser Application Scenario - Full Screen Mode Search Information]( https://i.miji.bid/2025/02/21/873e3d7a823e46a0683ba55c48f03016.gif)

chunks.zh: ![SlideBrowser 应用场景 - 记录待办任务列表]( https://i.miji.bid/2025/02/21/163345ada4ebc5205fef73c0a30c512c.gif)
我自己平常主要有一下 2 点使用场景：
chunks.en: I usually have the following 2 main usage scenarios:

chunks.zh: - 翻译：我不是很喜欢那些有气泡的翻译软件，所以平时有什么翻译内容，所以我将 Google 翻译的页面一直放在那里，需要的时候就滑动一下；
chunks.en: - Translation: I don't really like those translation software with bubbles, so usually when I have something to translate, I keep the Google Translate page there, and just slide it out when needed;

chunks.zh: - 管理项目进度：虽然是独立开发，但也是会把任务梳理清楚，然后放到 Github Project 里面，并且在做的过程中遇到什么难点以及增加的任务都会快速记录，如果解决了就快速点击完成，感觉还是挺好的。
chunks.en: - Manage project progress: Although it is independent development, I will also sort out the tasks clearly and put them in Github Project, and quickly record any difficulties and added tasks encountered in the process. If it is solved, I will quickly click to complete, which feels pretty good.

chunks.zh: - 可通过隐藏/显示侧边栏，让窗口更简洁（只保留页面）
chunks.en: - You can hide/show the sidebar to make the window more concise (only keep the page)

chunks.zh: - 支持自由拖拽模式（可以不用贴在屏幕边缘）
chunks.en: - Supports free drag and drop mode (no need to stick to the edge of the screen)
